bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of conditions of abdominal pain brought forth by hui chong 蛔蟲 , roundworms. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry han hao chong 寒號蟲 quotes Ji xiao fang 集效方 : 小兒蛔痛：五靈 脂末二錢，白礬火飛半錢。每服一錢，水一盞，煎五分，温服。當吐蟲 出，愈 , “ Roundworm pain in children: wu ling zhi powder, 2 qian ; bai fan sublimate, ½ qian . Each dose to be ingested is 1 qian . Place in a bowl of water and boil down to one half. To be ingested warm. This will remove the worms by vomiting. This is the cure”.
